content_excerpt:
Half a camel production <halfacamelproductions@gmail.com>
Working ticket link?
17 messages
Joanna Jarvie <joannalouisejarvie@gmail.com>
20 April 2025 at 22:06
To: takepart@brightonfringe.org
Cc: Half a camel production <halfacamelproductions@gmail.com>
Hello,
My event Crazy Stupid Funny on the 8th May doesn’t have a working ticket link? Can you please let me know if this can be fixed?
Thank you!
Jo Jarvie x
Take Part <takepart@brightonfringe.org>
21 April 2025 at 09:50
To: Joanna Jarvie <joannalouisejarvie@gmail.com>
Cc: Half a camel production <halfacamelproductions@gmail.com>, BoxOffice <boxoffice@brightonfringe.org>
Hi Joanna,
Thanks for getting in touch. 
Is this on our website? If so, I've Cc'ed our Box Office team who will be able to help you.
Thanks,
Laura
Brighton Fringe Artist & Venue Services Team
T: 01273 764 907
A: Office 4, The Old Court House, 118 Church Street, BN1 1UD
W: www.brightonfringe.org
#BrightonFringe
